OpenSim::MarkerData

MarkerData Class Reference

#include <MarkerData.h>

Inheritance diagram for MarkerData:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class implementing a sequence of marker frames from a TRC/TRB file.

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0
